thread.title: Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy
thread.title_full: Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy

title: Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy
text:
> Entertainment Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, speaks as Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., listens during the CNN Democratic presidential debate Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas. Clinton and Sanders clashed over U.S. involvement in the Middle East, gun control and economic policy, outlining competing visions for a party seeking to keep the White House for a third straight term. (AP Photo/John Locher)
